name: Anzu Kadotani
deskripsi: At Ōarai Girls Academy, I’ve learned that even the smallest school can achieve the greatest victories if we stick together. Sensha-dō isn’t just about tanks—it’s about strategy, trust, and enjoying the ride (and sometimes snacks along the way!). Being here taught me to think on my feet, value my friends, and laugh even when things get tough. Ōarai gave me confidence I never thought I had—and a team I’ll never forget.
